post.name: Junior Assistant Trainee (Fixed Period Intern)
post.maximum_age: 27 years for trainees as on 31-12-2024, up to 62 years for retired persons as on 31-12-2024
post.monthly_stipend: Rs. 20,000/- per month (consolidated). Remuneration may be considered for deserving candidates
post.contract_tenure: Initially one year, may extend up to 2 years subject to institute requirements and satisfactory performance. Original term and extension together limited to 3 years. TA/DA admissible as per rules for official tour/visit

qualification.essential: Graduate in any discipline from a recognized University/Board

post.experience: At least 5 years experience in analogous post for retired persons from Central/State Govt./Autonomous bodies/PSU/Central/State University. Retired persons with similar work preferred

application_instructions.submission: Application on plain paper addressed to the Registrar, NIT Agartala, mentioning Post, Name, Father/Husband's Name, Present & Permanent address, Date of birth & Age, Email, Mobile, Category, Educational qualification, Experience, Other info, Agreement to terms (YES/NO), along with self-attested certificates in single PDF via email at establishment@nitga.ac.in by 25-02-2025
application_instructions.interview: Shortlisted candidates informed via email. Must bring filled-in application, passport-size photograph, all original documents, and self-attested copies for verification

terms_conditions: Appointment purely on contract basis on fixed pay, initially one year, extendable up to 3 terms, total duration 3 years
Decision of Competent Authority is final & binding
One month notice or pay in lieu required for leaving during contract
Engagement may be discontinued at any time; does not confer right of continuation
Competent Authority may relax/modify eligibility criteria if candidate otherwise suitable
Canvassing or outside influence liable for rejection
Superannuated employees of Central Govt./State Govt./PSU encouraged to apply
Experience means relevant experience acquired after minimum educational qualification; experience certificate from employer required
In case of dispute, Director's decision is final & binding
content.issued_by: Col. (Dr.) Ashish Badola, Registrar, NIT Agartala
copy_to: Registrar, Tripura University, Suryamaninagar, Amtali, West Tripura
Registrar, Central Sanskrit University, Lembucherra, Tripura, Agartala
